actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require pre-market approval of food derived from genetically modified plants.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit unapproved introduction into interstate commerce of food from genetically modified plants. Allows approval only if the food is safe.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require pre-market approval of food derived from genetically modified plants.
